attributes.action: go surfing with me on the weekend
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: surfing is the best way for me to unwind from a hectic schedule. Gordon Bennett has one of if not THE more hectic schedule in the UK. I suggest that he go surfing with me on the weekend so to understand how relaxing it truly is.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
